title: Bose Soundlink Bluetooth Speaker III -
description: The SoundLink Bluetooth Speaker III from Bose plays crystal-clear music when paired to your compatible smartphone, MP3 player or tablet. You and your friends can enjoy the music for up to 14 hours. Your favourite tunes will never sound better than with this speaker that features 4 drivers and 2 passive radiators for full-spectrum audio.

title: Bose Soundlink Color Bluetooth Speaker -
description: Available in assorted colours. The Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth speaker connects wirelessly to your smartphone, tablet or other Bluetooth-enabled devices - up to 2 devices at a time! Enjoy crystal-clear audio and listen to your favourite tunes like never before, plus you can use the voice prompts to help talk you through Bluetooth pairing so it's easier than ever to love your music wirelessly. Enjoy up to 8 hours of play time with the rechargeable Li-Ion battery.

title: Edifier MP700 Portable Bluetooth Speaker -
description: With midrange speaker drivers, the Edifier MP700 Portable Bluetooth Speaker offers enhanced bass performance for great music while on-the-go. Experience a long battery life thank to the integrated rechargeable battery, and use the 5V charging output to give your phone an extra boost of power when needed.

title: Gadgetree Party Light Bluetooth Speaker -
description: Get your next party started with a great disco-like light show and amazing music with the portable Party Light Bluetooth Speaker from Gadgetree!

title: Headrush Select Portable Bluetooth Speakers -
description: The HeadRush portable Bluetooth speaker delivers powerful sound you're sure to love. Sync your Bluetooth-enabled tech to this speaker and experience your favourite music like never before! Plus, if you don't want to stream music wirelessly, you can connect your devices to the auxiliary input with an audio cable (sold separately). Keep the music playing while you're on the go for up to 4 hours with its built-in rechargeable battery. Not only does it play music for friends and family to enjoy, but it also connects to your compatible smartphone for convenient handsfree chatting courtesy of its built-in mic and speakerphone capability. Bring this speaker with you wherever you go, with the ultra-portable design.

title: Monster Streamcast S1 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker -
description: Listen to your favourite tunes with this Monster StreamCast S1 Wireless BluetoothÂ® Speaker which delivers extreme clarity, great dynamics, and punchy bass! The Monster StreamCast S1 is both a Bluetooth speaker and Wi-Fi speaker, letting you listen to the all the streaming music you love despite technology. Itâ€™s the freedom and convenience you need with the unrivalled Pure Monster SoundÂ® you deserve. Includes an integrated 1/4-20 threaded insert for wall mount.

title: Monster Streamcast S2 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker -
description: Listen to your favourite tunes with this Monster StreamCast S2 Wireless BluetoothÂ® Speaker which delivers extreme clarity, great dynamics, and punchy bass! The Monster StreamCast S2 is both a Bluetooth speaker and Wi-Fi speaker, letting you listen to the all the streaming music you love despite technology. Itâ€™s the freedom and convenience you need with the unrivalled Pure Monster SoundÂ® you deserve. Includes an integrated 1/4-20 threaded insert for wall mount.

title: Monster Superstar Backfloat 24K High-Definition Bluetooth Speaker -
description: Bring Pure Monster Sound to your pool party or the great outdoors with the SuperStar BackFloat BluetoothÂ® speaker that is designed to float in water. The tough, durable, water-proof, shock-proof shell is designed for active lifestyles and can be connected to any music device using a 3.5mm Aux line out. It includes a built-in mic with advanced noise cancellation for crystal clear hands-free calling. The protective carry pouch is acoustically transparent to allow you to listen to your favorite music while on the move.

title: Monster Superstar High Definition Bluetooth Speaker -
description: This ultra-compact, high-performance Bluetooth speaker delivers best in class wireless stereo sound. The built-in mic with advanced noise cancellation enables clear wireless handsfree calling and conferencing. Connects to any music device using a 3.5mm aux line out.

title: Select 2.1 Channel Multimedia Speaker Systems - From
description: The InStudio 2.1 Bluetooth multi-media speaker system features 28W + 14W x 2 total output power. Includes wired desktop volume control.

title: Select Bluetooth Speakers - From
description: This portable and rugged water-resistant Bluetooth speaker from HeadRush is ideal for listening in the bathroom, kitchen or even by the poolside! Designed to offer powerful sound, this speaker is an ideal companion for your smartphone and other compatible Bluetooth devices. Easily connect via Bluetooth pairing or just tap your NFC enabled device for an instant streaming connection. It really is that easy. Oh, and it the sound really rocks, too.

title: Sony All-In-One Micro System -
description: Your home deserves more than just a simple speaker; get everything you could need when you invest in the Sony All-in-One Micro System! With a clock display, timers, radio, and Bluetooth connectivity, this speaker is extremely versatile. Enjoy fantastic sound from this speaker, which is equipped with MEGA BASS boost circuitry and dual passive radiators.
